info.title: The Selling Partner API for Amazon External Fulfillment Shipments Processing
info.description: You can use the External Fulfillment Shipments API to retrieve, manage, and track shipments processed through Amazon's external fulfillment network. Use this API to get shipment details, monitor status changes, and access fulfillment requirements.

get.description: Get a list of shipments created for the seller in the status you specify. Shipments can be further filtered based on the fulfillment node or the time of the shipments' last update.

parameters.name: locationId
parameters.description: The Amazon channel location identifier for the shipments you want to retrieve.

parameters.name: marketplaceId
parameters.description: The marketplace ID associated with the location. To find the ID for your marketplace, refer to [Marketplace IDs](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/marketplace-ids).

parameters.name: channelName
parameters.description: The channel name associated with the location.

parameters.name: status
parameters.description: The status of shipment you want to include in the response. To retrieve all new shipments, set this value to `ACCEPTED`.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The order is newly created, but there is not enough inventory to accept it automatically.
The order is newly created and is accepted.
The order is confirmed by the seller.
The order's package is created by the seller.
The order's pickup slots are retrieved by the seller.
The order's invoice is generated by the seller.
The order's shipping label is generated by the seller.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedAfter
parameters.description: The response includes shipments whose latest update is after the specified time. In [ISO 8601](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/iso-8601) date-time format.

parameters.name: lastUpdatedBefore
parameters.description: The response includes shipments whose latest update is before the specified time. In [ISO 8601](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/iso-8601) date-time format.

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: The maximum number of shipments to include in the response.

parameters.name: paginationToken
parameters.description: A token that you use to retrieve the next page of results. The response includes `nextToken` when there are multiple pages of results. To get the next page of results, call the operation with this token and include the same arguments as the call that produced the token. To get a complete list, call this operation until `nextToken` is null. Note that this operation can return empty pages.

200.description: Success. The response contains a list of shipments.

get.description: Get a list of shipping options for a package in a shipment given the shipment's marketplace and channel. If the marketplace and channel have a pre-determined shipping option, then this operation returns an empty response.

parameters.name: shipmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the shipment to which the package belongs.

parameters.name: packageId
parameters.description: The ID of the package for which you want to retrieve shipping options.

ErrorList.description: An object containing a list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

errors.description: A list of error responses returned when a request is unsuccessful.

Error.description: Error response returned when the request is unsuccessful.

code.description: An error code that identifies the type of error that occurred.

message.description: A message that describes the error condition.

details.description: Additional details that can help the caller understand or fix the issue.

Decimal.description: A decimal number with no loss of precision. Useful when precision loss is unacceptable, as with currencies.

Amount.description: An amount of money, including units in the form of currency.

currencyCode.description: Three digit currency code in ISO 4217 format.

DateTime.description: A date and time in [ISO 8601](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/iso-8601) format.

SKU.description: The seller SKU of a product (catalog item). A unique number assigned by the seller when listing an item.

name.description: The name of the person, business or institution at that address.

addressLine1.description: The first line of the address.

district.description: The district or state where the person, business, or institution is located.

municipality.description: The municiplaity where the person, business, or institution is located.

state.description: The state or region where the person, business, or institution is located.

city.description: The city where the person, business, or institution is located.

countryCode.description: The two digit country code. In ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 format.

postalCode.description: The postal code of the address. It contains a series of letters or digits or both, sometimes including spaces or punctuation.

email.description: The email address of the contact associated with the address.

copyEmails.description: The email cc addresses of the contact associated with the address.

phoneNumber.description: The phone number of the person, business, or institution located at the address.

value.description: The numerical value of the dimension. Must be a positive value.

dimensionUnit.description: The unit of measurement of the dimension.

value.description: The numerical value of the weight. Must be a positive value.

weightUnit.description: The unit of measurement of the weight.

Charge.description: A shipment's charge with relevant tax information.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The charge is for the product.
The charge is for gift wrapping.
The charge is the total charge.
The charge is for something else.

totalCharge.description: The total charge, including the base charge and taxes.

Charges.description: The charges associated with the shipment.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Integrated goods and services tax. India specific.
State goods and services tax. India specific.
Central goods and services tax. India specific.
Union territory goods and services tax. India specific.

MarketplaceAttributes.description: The marketplace attributes associated with the location.

marketplaceId.description: The marketplace ID associated with the location. To find the ID for your marketplace, refer to [Marketplace IDs](https://developer-docs.amazon.com/sp-api/docs/marketplace-ids).

channelName.description: The channel name associated with the location.

merchantId.description: The ID of the merchant or seller to whom this order is created.

customAttributes.description: Marketplace channel-specific custom attributes for the order. These attributes are not mandatory and each channel can provide them differently.

Package.description: A package that is created to ship one or more of a shipment's line items.

id.description: An ID that uniquely identifies a package within a shipment.

weight.description: The weight of the package. The package must weigh at least 5 grams.

hazmatLabels.description: The optional list of HAZMAT labels applied to the package.

packageLineItems.description: The list of line items in a package.

status.description: The current status of the package.

packageHandlingRequirements.description: Whether the package requires standard handling or extra care.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The package requires extra care in handling.

PackageLineItems.description: The list of line items in a package.

PackageLineItem.description: A line item in a package.

quantity.description: The number of items of a particular line item of a shipment that are packed into the package.

serialNumbers.description: The list of serial numbers of items in the package, if required to be provided.

pieces.description: The number of pieces of a multi-piece item that are in this package. This is applicable only for items that are shipped in multiple pieces.

countryOfOrigin.description: The country of origin provided by the seller, represented by a two-letter country code in ISO-3166 alpha-2 format. You must pass this field when `countryOfOriginRequirement` is `REQUIRED` in the `getShipment` or `getShipments` response.

itemValue.description: The value of the item being shipped, as provided by the seller. This serves as the basis for import duty/tax calculations. You must pass this field when `itemValueRequirement` is `REQUIRED` in the `getShipment` or `getShipments` response.

RecommendedPackageLineItem.description: A line item to be contained in a recommended package. This attribute is provided only for orders that come with a specific recommendation of line-item distribution within the package recommendations.

lineItemId.description: An ID for a line item in an order. The line item should be present in the recommended package. This identifier has the same value as the ID of the line item present in the order.

RecommendedPackageLineItems.description: A list of line items to be contained in a recommended package. This attribute is only for orders that come with specific recommendations for line-item distribution.

RecommendedPackages.description: Recommendations for the packages in an order.

ShipmentLineItem.description: Information about a line item in a shipment.

shipmentLineItemId.description: An identifier for a shipment's line item. This identifier is guaranteed to be unique within the scope of its containing shipment.

merchantSku.description: The seller's identifier for the SKU in this line item.

numberOfUnits.description: The number of items of the SKU in this line item.

serialNumbers.description: The serial numbers for each item in this line item.

pieceType.description: Whether the line item has multiple pieces.

hazmatLabels.description: A list of HAZMAT label identifiers that must be applied to the packages for this line item.

giftAttributes.description: Information about any gift wrapping that is needed for this line item.

charges.description: The charges associated with the line item. The charge amount does not include the tax amount.

cancellations.description: A list of cancellations for the given line item.

hsnCode.description: The HSN code of SKU in this line item.

recommendedCountryOfOrigin.description: The country of origin recommended by the marketplace, represented as a two-letter country code following the ISO-3166 alpha-2 standard.

countryOfOrigin.description: The country of origin provided by the seller, represented by a two-letter country code in ISO-3166 alpha-2 format. You must pass this field when `countryOfOriginRequirement` is `REQUIRED` in the `getShipment` or `getShipments` response.

recommendedCurrencyCode.description: The three digit currency code of the currency recommended by the marketplace, in ISO 4217 format.

itemValue.description: The value of the item being shipped, as provided by the seller. This serves as the basis for import duty/tax calculations. You must pass this field when `itemValueRequirement` is `REQUIRED` in the `getShipment` or `getShipments` response.

complianceAttributes.description: All necessary compliance attributes specific to the line item.

customAttributes.description: A list of custom passthrough attributes. For details on these attributes, reach out to your respective program teams at Amazon.

ComplianceAttributes.description: All necessary compliance attributes specific to the line item.

hazmatLabelsRequirement.description: Whether hazardous material labels must be applied on packages containing this line item.

serialNumberRequirement.description: Whether serial numbers must be provided for this line item.

countryOfOriginRequirement.description: Whether the country of origin must be provided for this line item.

itemValueRequirement.description: Whether the item value must be provided for this line item.

GiftAttributes.description: Information about any gift wrapping that is needed for this line item.

giftWrapRequirement.description: When true, the line item must be gift wrapped.

giftWrapLabel.description: The label to be printed on the wrapped gift.

giftMessagePresence.description: When true, there is a gift message that must be printed on the wrapped gift.

giftMessage.description: The gift message that is to be printed on the wrapped gift.

Cancellations.description:
A list of cancellations for the given line item.

**Note:** Currently, SmartConnect does not support partial cancellation of a shipment or its line items. This list will contain a single value with all the cancellation details.

cancelledQuantity.description: The number of items of this particular item which have been cancelled.

cancelledTimestamp.description: The UNIX timestamp of when the line item was cancelled.

cancellationType.description: The type of cancellation of the item in the shipment.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: SmartConnect initiated the cancellation. No further action is required.

cancellationReason.description: The reason for the cancellation of the shipment.

locationId.description: The location identifier of the seller's location in the marketplace channel to which the shipment has been created for fulfillment.

marketplaceAttributes.description: The marketplace attributes from which the shipment has been created for fulfillment.

partyInfoList.description: All involved party identification and metadata for vendor, buyer, seller. Applicable for direct-fulfillment sellers.

shipmentRequirements.description: Whether a specific capabilities are enabled/required for the shipment.

charges.description: The charges associated with the shipment. The charge amount does not include the tax amount.

status.description: The current status of the shipment.

subStatus.description: The sub status of the shipment.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The shipment is at the origin fulfillment center.
The shipment is at the destination fulfillment center.
The shipment is out for delivery.

lineItems.description: The line items in the shipment.

shippingInfo.description: Shipping information for the packages in this shipment.

packages.description: The list of packages in the shipment.

creationDateTime.description: The date and time when the shipment was created.

lastUpdatedDateTime.description: The date and time when the shipment was last updated.

earliestPackDateTime.description: The time when the shipment becomes eligible for processing.

ShippingInfo.description: Shipping information for the packages in a shipment.

recommendedShipMethod.description: The ship method recommended by the Amazon Fulfillment Network for the packages in this shipment.

expectedShippingDateTimeInUTC.description: The date and time when Amazon expects the seller to ship the packages.

shipToAddress.description: The address to which the packages must be shipped. Provide only basic information about the buyer's address needed for taxation purposes.

shippingType.description: The type of shipping that the seller uses to deliver a customer order.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Shipping is handled by the marketplace platform.
Shipping is handled by the seller using their own logistics.
The replacing shipment's SKUs are different than the original.
The replacing shipment's SKUs are the same as the original.

originalShipmentInfo.description: This field contains details of the original shipment if `shipmentType` is either `REPLACEMENT` or `EXCHANGE`.

numberOfUnits.description: Total number of units in the shipment.

orderStatesEligibleForRejection.description: A list of order statuses for which the marketplace allows order rejection (seller cancellation). If the order has a status that does not belong to this list, then seller cancellation is not possible.

orderPlacedTimestamp.description: The timestamp of when the order was placed, in UTC

processingSource.description: The source of the order operation.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The shipment is not shipped using the SmartConnect platform.
The shipment is shipped using the SmartConnect platform.

ShipmentRequirements.description: Whether specific capabilities are enabled or required for the shipment.

pSlip.description: Whether the packing slip must be attached to the shipment.

invoice.description: Whether the invoice must be attached to the shipment.

PackingSlipRequirement.description: Whether the packing slip is required to be attached to the shipment, and its corresponding status.

requirement.description: Whether the packing slip is required to be attached to the shipment.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The packing slip is required to be attached to the shipment.
The packing slip is not required to be attached to the shipment.

status.description: The status of the packing slip that is attached to the shipment.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The packing slip is not generated.

InvoiceRequirement.description: Whether the invoice document is required to be attached to the shipment and its corresponding status.

requirement.description: Whether the invoice document is required to be attached to the shipment.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The invoice is required to be attached to the shipment.
The invoice is not required to be attached to the shipment.

status.description: The status of the of the invoice document that is attached to the shipment.

PartyIdentificationInfoList.description: All involved party identification and metadata for the vendor, buyer, and seller. Applicable for direct-fulfillment sellers.

PartyIdentificationInfo.description: Party identification details for the shipment, applicable to direct fulfillment shipments.

partyId.description: Assigned identification for the party. For example, a warehouse code or vendor code.

partyType.description: Assigned identification for the party. For example, a warehouse code or vendor code.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The party to whom the bill is sent.
The party to whom the shipment is sent.
The party from whom the shipment is sent.
The party who is selling the goods.

taxInfo.description: Tax registration details of the entity.

TaxRegistrationInfo.description: Tax registration details of the entity. Applicable to direct fulfillment shipments.

type.description: Tax registration type for the entity

number.description: The tax registration number for the party. For example, their VAT ID.

address.description: The address associated with the tax registration number.

messages.description: Tax registration message that can be used for additional tax related details.

ReplacedShipmentInfo.description: Details of the original shipment if `shipmentType` is either `REPLACEMENT` or `EXCHANGE`.

originalLineItems.description: The line items from the original shipment that corresponds to this shipment.

OriginalLineItems.description: The line items from the original shipment that corresponds to this shipment.

OriginalLineItem.description: A line item from the original shipment that corresponds to this shipment.

replacingSku.description: The SKU ID for this shipment

originalSku.description: The SKU ID for the original shipment.

charges.description: The charge details at the shipment level.

invoiceId.description: The unique ID of the invoice that corresponds to the shipment.

RequirementLevel.description: The requirement level for this field.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: This field must not be provided.

PieceType.description: Whether the item is a single piece or multiple pieces.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The item is a single piece.
The item consists of multiple pieces.

PresenceStatus.description: Whether the element is present or absent.

Pagination.description: An object representing data required for pagination of results.

nextToken.description: A token that you use to retrieve the next page of results. The response includes `nextToken` when there are multiple pages of results. To get the next page of results, call the operation with this token and include the same arguments as the call that produced the token. To get a complete list, call this operation until `nextToken` is null. Note that this operation can return empty pages.

pagination.description: How to manage multiple pages of data.

CountryCode.description: A two-letter country code, as defined by the ISO-3166 alpha-2 standard.

SerialNumber.description: The serial number of the SKU in this line item.

PackageDeliveryStatus.description: The delivery status of the package.

ShippingOptionsResponse.description: The response to the `retrieveShippingOptions` operation. The response contains shipping options on a per-package basis from which the seller has to select one shipping option while they retrieve the shipping label. If the particular marketplace channel does not support scheduled shipping options, then this response will be empty.

recommendedShippingOption.description: The recommended shipping options that a marketplace channel provides to the seller.

packageIds.description: The subset of package IDs used to generate a label.

items.description: The ID of a package for which you want a shipping label.

PackageShipLabelList.description: A list of label documents for each package specified in the request. In case of partial failures when generating labels, the `isErrored` and `errorDetails` attributes detail the cause of failure.

ShipLabelMetadata.description: Metadata for a ship label document.

shippingOptionId.description: The selected slot for the ship label.

trackingId.description: The tracking number of the package.

pickupWindow.description: The time window during which the package was picked up.

timeSlot.description: A time window during which to hand over the package to Amazon Logistics.

Document.description: A document, described by its file type and data.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The file is a Zebra Programming Language (ZPL) file.

ShippingOptions.description: Shipping options for a single package.

shippingOptionId.description: An identifier for the shipping option.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The shipper is the marketplace platform.
The shipper is a third party.
The shipper is not the marketplace, seller, or a third party.

carrierName.description: The carrier name for the offering.

pickupWindow.description: The time window during which the package will be picked up.

timeSlot.description: A time window to hand over the package to or from Amazon Logistics.

TimeWindow.description: Time duration used to specify the interval of an event, such as pick up and delivery.

startTime.description: The start time of the window.

endTime.description: The end time of the window.

handoverMethod.description: Whether the seller picks up from Amazon Logistics or drops off to Amazon Logistics.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The seller picks up the package from Amazon Logistics.
The seller drops off the package to Amazon Logistics.
The package is out for delivery.

ShipmentAcknowledgementRequest.description: Information about the shipment and its line items, used to confirm or reject line items.

referenceId.description: A unique identifier for every shipment rejection.

lineItems.description: Details about the line items from the shipment that are being confirmed or rejected by the seller.

DocumentV2.description: An [S3-Presigned URL](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/using-presigned-url.html) you can use to retrieve file contents.

url.description:
A presigned URL to fetch the ship label file using an HTTP GET request. To determine file type, use the `contentType` header of the file response. The file retrieved will be in one of the following supported formats:

- **ZPL**: `x.application/zpl`
- **PDF**: `application/pdf`
- **PNG**: `image/png`
- **Plain Text**: `text/plain`

Packages.description: The request schema of the `createPackages` operation.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The order contains products that are Prime eligible.
The order is an expedited order.

CustomAttribute.description: A custom attribute that is loosely typed, modeled through a key-value pair and its data type.

key.description: The key of the custom attribute. Must be unique.

value.description: The value of the custom attribute.

CustomAttributeType.description: The data type of the custom attribute value to aid with parsing during deserialization.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: Double precision floating point data type.

PackageShipLabel.description: A shipping label with a label document for a single package. If label generation fails, you can use the `status` and `errorDetails` attributes to determine the cause of failure.

packageId.description: The package ID of the package.

status.description: Whether label generation failed for the current package. If `FAILURE`, use `errorDetails` to determine details of the failure.

errorDetails.message: A temporary failure occurred in the SmartConnect product.

CourierSupportedAttributes.description: The tracking details of the package if it is shipped by a third party courier. This attribute should only be provided when the value of `shipBy` is `THIRD_PARTY_CARRIER`.

carrierName.description: The name of the courier service used to ship the package

trackingId.description: The tracking number of the package.

LineItem.description: Information about the line item being confirmed or rejected.

id.description: The identifier of the line item from the shipment that is being confirmed or rejected by the seller.

quantity.description: The quantity of the line item.

LineItemWithReason.description: Information about the line item being confirmed or rejected and the reason for the rejection.

reason.description: The reason for the rejection of the line item.

x-docgen-enum-table-extension.description: The item is out of stock.
